channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Tree is very tall with overgrown /overhanging branches blocking the street and shedding too many leaves lights, 28th August
item.description:
Branches are blocking the street lights at night, damaging the nearby tree opposite that was newly planted, shedding too many leaves at various times of the year which is going into my front and back garden when it's breezy and I have to clean to many times. When wet due to rain, the so many wet leaves becomes a hazard to people slipping and can cause accidents and trips or falls

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Westmoreland Road, Walworth, London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Harbex Close, Bexley, London

item.title: Dog fowling outside my house, 28th August
item.description:
The sign for dog fowling , outside my property needs to be replaced as it’s very old and weather worn, which means we keep getting dog mess outside our house. We do not own any animals.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): King Harolds Way, West Heath, London

item.title: Dog wastes next to my flat windows, 28th August
item.description:
I’ve noticed that dog waste is often left in front of the house below mine, directly in view of my kitchen window (which is floor-to-ceiling). It’s very visible while cooking and creates an unpleasant and unhygienic environment. When the windows are open, the smell can also come through. Would it be possible to address this issue?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 12, Hazel Close, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TREE IN GARDEN OF Opposite No 1, 28th August
item.description:
Resident reporting there is a large tree in the garden opposite house No 1. The pavement has a lot of fallen fruit which is plums and this needs to be cleared away as it is a trip hazard for the residents and other wheelchair & pram users, pedestrians walk in the road due to this to avoid it going onto shoes etc. Please could someone look into this asap please
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Maynard Close, North End, London
Report on FixMyStreet
